content.html: Great review! Love the fact that gaming works as well as it should! Recieved a 8bitdo nes30pro controller I intend to use with the pocket. A sleeve or protective case for the pocket shouldn't be that hard to find, considering we have it's dimensions. But yeah, that keyboard. Oh well. Don't think GPD will do anything about the layout, but let's hope they deal with the quality. :)
content.text:
Great review! Love the fact that gaming works as well as it should! Recieved a 8bitdo nes30pro controller I intend to use with the pocket.
A sleeve or protective case for the pocket shouldn't be that hard to find, considering we have it's dimensions.
But yeah, that keyboard. Oh well. Don't think GPD will do anything about the layout, but let's hope they deal with the quality. :)
